remarks: Show that a function is the inverse of a function if their compositions are the identity functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fcof1od.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
fcof1od.g $e |- ( ph -> G : B --> A ) $.
fcof1od.a $e |- ( ph -> ( G o. F ) = ( _I |` A ) ) $.
fcof1od.b $e |- ( ph -> ( F o. G ) = ( _I |` B ) ) $.
2fcoidinvd $p |- ( ph -> `' F = G ) $.
